<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<polUni>
	<fvTenant name="test1_tenant" >
	 	 <l3extOut descr="" enforceRtctrl="export" name="test1_l3out" targetDscp="unspecified" status="cfeated,modified">
			<l3extRsEctx tnFvCtxName="test1_vrf" />
			<l3extRsL3DomAtt tDn="uni/l3dom-test2_l3out_dom" />
			<bgpExtP descr="" nameAlias=""/>
		</l3extOut>
	 	 <l3extOut descr="" enforceRtctrl="export" name="test2_l3out" targetDscp="unspecified" status="cfeated,modified">
			<l3extRsEctx tnFvCtxName="test2_vrf" />
			<l3extRsL3DomAtt tDn="uni/l3dom-test2_l3out_dom" />
			<bgpExtP descr="" nameAlias=""/>
		</l3extOut>
	</fvTenant>
</polUni>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<polUni>
	<fvTenant descr="" name="test1_tenant">
		<l3extOut descr="" name="" action="modified">
			<l3extLNodeP descr="" name="test1_l3out_node_profile" tag="yellow-green" targetDscp="unspecified" status="created,modified">
				<l3extRsNodeL3OutAtt rtrId="172.16.1.1" rtrIdLoopBack="yes" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-1201" action="created,modified" />
				<l3extRsNodeL3OutAtt rtrId="172.16.1.2" rtrIdLoopBack="yes" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-1202" action="created,modified" />
			</l3extLNodeP>
			<l3extLNodeP descr="" name="test2_l3out_node_profile" tag="yellow-green" targetDscp="unspecified" status="created,modified">
				<l3extRsNodeL3OutAtt rtrId="172.16.1.3" rtrIdLoopBack="yes" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-1202" action="created,modified" />
				<l3extRsNodeL3OutAtt rtrId="172.16.1.4" rtrIdLoopBack="yes" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-1203" action="created,modified" />
			</l3extLNodeP>
		</l3extOut>
		<l3extOut descr="" name="" action="modified">
			<l3extLNodeP descr="" name="test3_l3out_node_profile" tag="yellow-green" targetDscp="unspecified" status="created,modified">
				<l3extRsNodeL3OutAtt rtrId="172.16.1.1" rtrIdLoopBack="yes" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-1201" action="created,modified" />
				<l3extRsNodeL3OutAtt rtrId="172.16.1.2" rtrIdLoopBack="yes" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-1202" action="created,modified" />
			</l3extLNodeP>
			<l3extLNodeP descr="" name="test4_l3out_node_profile" tag="yellow-green" targetDscp="unspecified" status="created,modified">
				<l3extRsNodeL3OutAtt rtrId="172.16.1.3" rtrIdLoopBack="yes" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-1202" action="created,modified" />
				<l3extRsNodeL3OutAtt rtrId="172.16.1.4" rtrIdLoopBack="yes" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-1203" action="created,modified" />
			</l3extLNodeP>
		</l3extOut>
	</fvTenant>
</polUni>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<polUni>
	<fvTenant descr="" name="test1_tenant">
		<l3extOut descr="" name="" action="modified">
			<l3extLNodeP descr="" name="test1_l3out_node_profile" tag="yellow-green" targetDscp="unspecified" status="modified">
				<l3extRsNodeL3OutAtt rtrId="172.16.1.1" rtrIdLoopBack="yes" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-1201" action="created,modified" />
				<l3extRsNodeL3OutAtt rtrId="172.16.1.2" rtrIdLoopBack="yes" tDn="topology/pod-1/node-1202" action="created,modified" />
				<l3extLIfP descr="" name="test1_l3out_int_profile" tag="yellow-green" status="created,modified">
					<ospfIfP authKey = "" authKeyId="1" authType="md5" descr="" name="">
			  			<ospfRsIfPol tnOspfIfPolName=""/>
					</ospfIfP>
					<l3extRsNdIfPol tnNdIfPolName="" />
					<l3extRsPathL3OutAtt addr="0.0.0.0" descr="" encap="vlan-100" encapScope="local" ifInstT="ext-svi" llAddr="::" mode="regular" mtu="1500" tDn="topology/pod-/protpaths-1201-1202/pathep-test1_int_pol_group" targetDscp="unspecified">
			  			<l3extMember addr="10.11.11.2/24" descr="" llAddr="::" name="" side="A" />
			  			<l3extMember addr="10.11.11.3/24" descr="" llAddr="::" name="" side="B" />
					</l3extRsPathL3OutAtt>
				</l3extLIfP>
			</l3extLNodeP>
		</l3extOut>
	</fvTenant>
</polUni>
